definition: courtyard/atrium/opening in a roof/skylight/caisson ceiling/(TCM) acupuncture point TB10
Jing, one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/surname Jing

sentences.english: Sub-cellar housing the ancient halls are dry and wet courtyard patio.
sentences.chinese: 古窨子屋堂內有幹天井和溼天井。

sentences.english: Sub-cellar housing the ancient halls are dry and wet courtyard patio.
sentences.chinese: 古窨子屋堂內有幹天井和溼天井。

sentences.english: The granite pavement of the courtyard is wet because it rained last night.
sentences.chinese: 天井裏的青石板是溼漉漉的，因爲昨晚下了一陣雨。

sentences.english: The void acts not only as a large light well but also encourages natural ventilation within the house.
sentences.chinese: 天井不僅引入了自然光照也使房子能夠自然通風。

sentences.english: Two outdoor courtyards can be accessed from the main foyer.
sentences.chinese: 主休息室與兩個室外天井相連。

sentences.english: The circular courtyard, in front of the ancestral hall, is also paved with granite plate.
sentences.chinese: 回望祖堂前的圓形天井，也同樣是以花崗石板鋪面。

sentences.english: No one ever found out how he had managed to get into the courtyard without opening the big gates.
sentences.chinese: 別人永遠沒有知道他怎樣能不開正門便到了天井裏。

sentences.english: They came to the little court, which was shut in by old red walls.
sentences.chinese: 他們來到小天井，這裏四周由古老的紅牆環抱。

sentences.english: Ethnic singer singing in the yard outside Karma cafe.
sentences.chinese: 民族歌手在卡瑪聚外的天井傾情獻唱。

sentences.english: The object of the Picture is the settlement of the Tianjingguan Village of Zezhou county in Shanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 本文以山西省澤州縣天井關聚落爲研究對象。

sentences.english: The door is the inner wall of the courtyard, the same is a two-story brick and wood houses.
sentences.chinese: 進門便是牆門的內天井，同樣又是兩層磚木結構民房。

sentences.english: She saw the silvery-blue roof of the House and the entrance to a courtyard beyond.
sentences.chinese: 她看到銀藍色的屋頂和一個天井的入口。

sentences.english: The sun into two layers wooden corridors, fell in the bottom of the courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 陽光直透過二層木結構迴廊，落在底層的天井上。

sentences.english: All around the walls was a terraced patio with a balustrade.
sentences.chinese: 上層的窗戶通向陽臺，圍牆圍着一方有欄杆的天井。

sentences.english: A prisoner stares sadly into a courtyard from behind the bars of his cell's small window.
sentences.chinese: 一個囚犯站在窗欄後面，通過小窗洞悲傷地看着天井。

sentences.english: The programme called for the conservation of the volumes through the creation of central patios.
sentences.chinese: 項目要求通過創建中央天井來保護體量。

definition: a screen wall across the gate of a house (for privacy)
residence consisting of structures surrounding a courtyard on three sides
winding corridor/cloister/ambulatory (covered walkway around a cloister)
spirit wall (screen wall used to shield an entrance in traditional Chinese architecture)
central room of a traditional Chinese house
